title: Crossbow

properties.name: description
properties.value: The crossbow is the weakest type of crossbow along with the Phoenix crossbow, and requires a Ranged level of 1 to wield. It can only fire bronze bolts (and Mith Grapple). One can buy the crossbow and the bolts from Lowe's Archery Emporium in Varrock. There is a crossbow spawn in the Graveyard of Shadows, Bone Yard and the building with the bank in Lands End (south-west of Kourend Woodland).

Item ID837

The crossbow is the weakest type of crossbow along with the Phoenix crossbow, and requires a Ranged level of 1 to wield. It can only fire bronze bolts (and Mith Grapple). One can buy the crossbow and the bolts from Lowe's Archery Emporium in Varrock. There is a crossbow spawn in the Graveyard of Shadows, Bone Yard and the building with the bank in Lands End (south-west of Kourend Woodland).

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

29 May 2007
(update)

The item was graphically updated with the rework of Shield of Arrav.
